duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce TV+ localized featured content for the TV App, iTunes, and other platforms with limited supervision.
Collaborate with internal and external partners to ensure seamless localization workflows and product launches.
Manage input of localized data into internal systems and ensure QA and troubleshooting of the copy's behavior in all relevant platforms and markets.
Ensure an equivalent or superior user experience for non-US customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field
